Modification_Detail.description: Updated schema version. Adding missing "instrument" references. Adding missing "telescope" references.

The Roque de los Muchachos Observatory, located on the island of La Palma in the Canary Islands, is one of the worldâ€™s premier sites for optical and infrared astronomy. It is home to a wide array of international telescopes, including the Gran Telescopio Canarias, and is particularly known for its research in cosmology, stellar evolution, and black holes.

Facility.name: Roque de los Muchachos Observatory
Facility.address: Astrophys. Inst. of the Canaries Apartado de Correos 303, E-38700 Santa Cruz (La Palma)
